preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 200 g of Lead (Pb), 120 g of Scandium (Sc), and 30 g of Technetium (Tc) using an accurate scale. 
 2. Grind the materials separately using a mortar and pestle until they are fine powders. 
 3. Combine the powders in a clean, dry mixing bowl. 
 4. Mix thoroughly using a spatula or mechanical mixer for at least 10 minutes to ensure uniformity.
